statement.p: In 32.14 of the last 28 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{28}}={0.3214}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{28}. \displaystyle{P}={0.3214}\cdot{28}={8.9992}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 28-8.9992=19.0008 We round that as requested to 19.
